price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߢߐ߯ߡߍ ߟߎ߬ ߡߊߝߟߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߓߊ߬ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߘߊ߲ߣߍ߲߫ ߢߊ ߡߍ߲؟
arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: afalā yanẓurūna ilā al-ibili kayfa khuliqat
